display_long_description:
Exercise the mind, body & soul in this fast-paced feast of micro challenges, high intensity boss battles and a concoction of collectibles that unravel as you jog across vibrant backdrops of color and joy.

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

[media]


# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

[media]


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

[media]


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

[media]


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

[media]


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

[media]

# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

![{"height":984,"type":"image","width":1748}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507165_447221264980420_8367178254206728213_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=xKehGN5nyT4Q7kNvgHbZvc_&_nc_oc=AdldxLhc4zfVv-3kEoIv74fceCxYx0ZqzhwGzufe3LslEpKqCNqkafsuIVNBaV9qhRM&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYGxoNzYJNu_M60ZECic8EAHU_BALTZ3TvleTIWsabNMnA&oe=67F10612)


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57570293_4078635569072597_4548948488473550523_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=l1DdoAX9YcsQ7kNvgGiDi8F&_nc_oc=AdnGKlmZ5Ls9zRUehTC2f6VkUXmIN82QYzg2oWLDXRwtxUr7CLOe8MoZ8Dw6-MEDGAk&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYGSvTnrRZA1VVEUSP0rFsiU-emJM8qTT6ATVKhL5uhQIw&oe=67F10CED)


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982723_2208705096178691_3774754884521119372_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=mUMXMPt87ssQ7kNvgH-GWjX&_nc_oc=AdlyE0XIWdv6QY9f_cmUcGjP8ikwO2OGnzkEhn36PMPCmLgH_4xpO6poXs7maqx5ue4&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYFhe9XC4MsYY3JIFreMwsf0vxlXHd4RQXIHk_nVpTBfYw&oe=67F12150)


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.
